description: Detects the use of Inveigh a cross-platform .NET IPv4/IPv6 machine-in-the-middle tool
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - Inveigh Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\Inveigh.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("\Inveigh.exe" OR "\Inveigh.dll")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Inveigh") OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ \-SpooferIP*" OR "*\ \-ReplyToIPs\ *" OR "*\ \-ReplyToDomains\ *" OR "*\ \-ReplyToMACs\ *" OR "*\ \-SnifferIP*")))
